name: Pet Sort Panic
description:
Tutorial:

CLICK and DRAG (HOLD THE BUTTON DOWN) to pick up pets and move them to the correct homes. After 3 wrong choices you will lose. Don't let the pets reach the end of the conveyor belt, as that is an instant loss.

Liluo IO Link: https://liluo.io/fatalexit/pet-sort-panic

My solo entry for GDevelop Gamejam #2.

 Compete on the leaderboard for a high score!

Info:

I made all the music for my game myself using FL Studio and Native Instruments Komplete.

I used and edited some SFX from Sidearm Studios Ultimate SFX Bundle, as well as created some custom SFX from scratch.

The art-style was a huge experiment. I did not use any preexisting art in my game, instead I generated images with Midjourney, then painted over and edited them in affinity suite  for many of the sprites and background elements (making them stylistically fit into the game). I did create some other assets from the ground up in Affinity Suite.
